titles.title: Safe Interactions Act of 2020
Safe Interactions Act of 2020

A bill to provide grants to enable nonprofit disability organizations to develop training programs that support safe interactions between law enforcement officers and individuals with disabilities and older individuals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Safe Interactions Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Justice to award grants to nonprofit disability organizations to develop training programs for law enforcement officers who may encounter individuals with disabilities.
